description.lang: The DCH-Z310 is designed to give early warning of developing fires by giving off the alarm sounds from its build-in alarm horn,based on Z-Wave technologyIt is the Z-Waveplus product, it supports the security, OTA... Those newestfeaturesoftheZ-Wave technology.Z-Wave isawireless communication protocol designed for home automation, specifically to remotelycontrolapplicationsinresidentialandlightcommercial environments. The technology uses a low-power RF radio embedded or retrofitted into home electronics devices and systems, such as lighting, home access control, entertainment systems and household appliances.
The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value is 12.The value is in minutes.
The interval time for auto report thebattery level.
Customer function switch, using bit control.Bit4: Notification Type,0: Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
Notification Type, Using Sensor Binary Report.
